text: Allah Taalaa ney payghumber kay haal per tawajja farmaee aur mohajreen aur ansaar kay haal per bhi jinhon ney aisi tangi kay waqt payghumbar ka sath diya iss kay baad kay inn mein say aik giroh kay dilon mein kuch tazalzul ho chala tha. Phir Allah ney unn kay haal per tawajja farmaee. Bila shuba Allah Taalaa inn sab per boht hi shafiq meharban hai
